HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
The mod is now a collection of Badge-sets and this update adds the following: - Star Wars Imperial Army - Star Wars Imperial Navy - Star Wars Rebels - WWII German Army
Also added are more transparent versions of the GDI and NOD sets.
If you have an idea for a badge-set or know of a set that need updating just leave a comment and Ill see if I can add it to the mod.
